comment.body:
@AdamWr Sorry, do you know how to use `replace` for this case in Firefox? I was intending to use this rule

```adb
||sudokugame.org/archive/online*.php$subdocument,document,replace=/function adjump/function adjump(nd){var fy=document.getElementById("y").value;var fm=document.getElementById("m").value;var fd=document.getElementById("d").value;jump(nd,fy,fm,fd);};function _adjump/
```

however the replacement doesn't happen. If I escape `,` to `\,` the replacement works but in that case, the string becomes literal `\,`.

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://mgthai.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fmgthai.com) ### Comment > App MG Thailand doesn't work if I have Adguard activated . In the past, I didn't have this problem. I believe this happens since they updated the app las 20Oct25. It finds a VPN. System says "Sorry. The MG isSmartt prohibits VPN". Even I have my VPN off, it says the same until I switch off Adguard. ### Screenshots

> Even I have my VPN off, it says the same until I switch off Adguard.

I can't check the app on my end. What if you disable it in the apps will it still be the same? Perhaps they detect the VPN in the system. It's better to ask [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardForAndroid/issues/).

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://mgthai.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fmgthai.com) ### Comment > App MG Thailand doesn't work if I have Adguard activated .
